text: hi everyone today's recipe is a very
refreshing Vietnamese drink with
influence from a Thai dessert it's
caught yet hi is a very pretty and
colorful dessert that combines a variety
of tropical fruits let's begin recipe to
make the acai jelly mix one tablespoon
of agar agar powder with four
tablespoons of cold water give it a good
stir you can also use gelatin instead
but please fill out the package
instruction accordingly in a small
saucepan add two cups of cold water 3 to
4 tbsp of sugar and the agar agar
mixture add the quarter teaspoons of
pandan extract or green food coloring
boy for three to five minutes and then
transfer to a container to set after a
few hours you will get the jelly like
this cut into thin strips you can also
buy the ready-made gradually in a can so
you don't have to make the jelly
yourself to make the Thai red rubies
you're going to need a can of water
chestnuts
if you can't fire them you can replace
with jicama or Apple they have a nice
crunchy texture just bring off the
liquid and dice into small cubes then
mix with some red food coloring and put
them in a plastic bag together with a
few tablespoons of tapioca starch
give it a good shake to coat the water
chestnut evenly then transfer to the
strainer to shake off the excess starch
bring a small saucepan of water to a
boil then add the water chestnuts cubes
give it a good stir so they won't stick
to each other
cook for a few minutes until they float
to the surface use a slotted spoon to
transfer the red rubies into a bowl of
ice cold water the coating will turn
translucent just like red rubies for the
tropical fruits it would be great if you
can buy fresh ones otherwise just by
longan likey rambutan in cans like this
I also use coconut gel Pat you Tony bam
seeds help ignore one of the must-haves
is jackfruit which you can buy in a can
or buy frozen or use fresh ones if you
have you also need some coconut milk
most of the canned fruits are soaked in
syrup so just open the cans drain and
keep the syrup for later use cut the
Lachi into smaller pieces cut the
jackfruit into strips Tory pumps it is a
great addition to the dessert because it
has a really nice crunchy texture just
cut them into thin slices now we have
everything ready to assemble our
desserts I also have peeled the fresh
longans
now just add the prepared items into a
fancy glass layer by layer you have
yellow jackfruits
green jelly white slightest translucent
20 pounds and longans if you don't have
time to prepare the red rubies actually
you can replace with some diced
strawberries or pomegranate seeds now
just fill the glass with some coconut
milk and you are ready you can replace
the coconut milk with half and half
which is richer add the syrup to your
taste and maybe some cross eyes too
that's it this is my version object hi
it looks pretty and tastes really
delicious and refreshing for summer just
give it a good stir and enjoy I hope
you're gonna give this recipe a try and
don't forget to send me a photo of your
food or upload to Instagram Facebook and
Google+ with hash tag Helen recipes so I
can feature your photos in my next
videos just like these wonderful photos
that I have received recently thank you
for watching
I
